java_ignore./minecraft:chorus_plant/: no connection data for chorus plant
java_ignore./minecraft:.*glass_pane\\[east=/: no connection data for glass pane
java_ignore./minecraft:redstone_wire\\[east=/: no connection data for redstone wire
java_ignore./minecraft:iron_bars\\[east=/: no connection data for iron bars
java_ignore./minecraft:vine\\[.*up=/: no top connection data for vines
java_ignore./minecraft:mangrove_propagule\\[age=/: no age data for mangrove propagule
java_ignore./minecraft:lightning_rod\\[.*powered=/: no power data for lightning rod
java_ignore./minecraft:(soul_)?campfire\\[.*signal_f: no signal fire data for campfire
java_ignore./minecraft:(red|brown)_mushroom_block\\[: only limited mushroom block data is saved
java_ignore./minecraft:mushroom_stem\\[down=/: only limited mushroom block data is saved
java_ignore./sculk_sensor_phase=(cooldown|active|ina: sculk sensor data is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:note_block/: noteblock data is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:jukebox/: jukebox data is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:.*_banner/: banner color is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:.*_bed/: bed color is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:.*shulker_box\\[facing=/: shulker box direction is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:(trapped_)?chest\\[.*type=/: chest connection is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:moving_piston/: piston state is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:(sticky_)?piston\\[extended=/: piston state is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:repeater\\[.*locked=/: repeater locking is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:lectern\\[.*has_book=/: lectern book is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:.*_(head|skull)/: skull data is saved as a tile
java_ignore./minecraft:potted_.*/: flower pot plant is saved as a tile
